mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim becomes our command. Sign up now and receive a complimentary golden crown with your first deposit-because you deserve nothing less!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I once had the most outrageous experience at a fancy spa resort. I strolled in, expecting to be treated like the pampered prince I am. But as soon as I walked through the doors, I noticed a sign that said, "No Outside Food or Drinks Allowed." Now, as Hot Josh, I do not abide by such rules, so I confidently strutted to the front desk with my grande caramel macchiato in hand.The receptionist had the audacity to tell me that I couldn't bring my coffee into the spa area. Can you believe it? Me, the esteemed Hot Josh, being denied the simple pleasure of sipping on my favorite beverage while I enjoy a relaxing massage. I was fuming inside, but I kept my composure and simply said, "Well, I guess I'll have to take my business elsewhere."And just like that, the manager came running out, apologizing profusely and practically begging me to stay. They offered to comp my entire spa day, upgrade my massage to a deluxe package, and even bring me a fresh batch of my beloved caramel macchiatos throughout the day. I smirked triumphantly, knowing that my entitlement had once again worked its magic. In the end, I left that spa feeling more relaxed and entitled than ever before, knowing that I had asserted my dominance in the realm of luxury experiences. Ah, the sweet taste of entitlement-it truly knows no bounds.
